content:
Using niche hashtags can help you attract a targeted audience interested in specific types of workouts and exercises. Here are some niche hashtags for glute exercises and yoga routines that you can use for your Instagram Reels:

**Glute Exercises:**

1. #gluteworkout (1.4 million+ uses)
2. #glutebuilding (844k+ uses)
3. #bootybuilding (555k+ uses)
4. #glutegains (441k+ uses)
5. #glutelife (344k+ uses)
6. #strongglutes (264k+ uses)
7. #gluteactivation (216k+ uses)
8. #glutestrengthening (174k+ uses)
9. #glutefocus (141k+ uses)
10. #gluteworkoutsforwomen (124k+ uses)

**Yoga Routines:**

1. #yogaroutine (1.3 million+ uses)
2. #yogaeverydamnday (1.1 million+ uses)
3. #yogalife (944k+ uses)
4. #yogapractice (744k+ uses)
5. #yogajourney (644k+ uses)
6. #yogainspiration (544k+ uses)
7. #yogachallenge (444k+ uses)
8. #yogabeginner (384k+ uses)
9. #yogatips (344k+ uses)
10. #yogabalance (294k+ uses)

**Other Niche Hashtags:**

1. #homeworkouts (2.5 million+ uses)
2. #fitnessmotivation (2.3 million+ uses)
3. #fitnesstips (1.8 million+ uses)
4. #fitnessinspiration (1.6 million+ uses)
5. #workoutinspiration (1.4 million+ uses)
6. #fitnessjourney (1.3 million+ uses)
7. #wellnesswednesday (1.2 million+ uses)
8. #fitnessaddict (1.1 million+ uses)
9. #fitlife (1 million+ uses)
10. #healthyliving (944k+ uses)

Remember to keep your hashtags relevant to the content of your Reels, and don't overdo it. Using 5-10 hashtags per post is a good rule of thumb. You can also create a unique hashtag for your brand and encourage your followers to use it when sharing their own workout videos or photos. Good luck with your Instagram Reels!
